Title: Enacts the "MTA board member attendance act"
Summary: Enacts the "MTA board member attendance act"; requires members of the metropolitan transportation authority to attend the majority of public hearings on fare hikes in order to cast a vote.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to enacting the "MTA board member attendance act"
